data.name: Tales from Candlekeep - Asharra's Diplomat Pack
data.detailed_description:
Dare to venture deeper into the deadly jungles of Chult with Asharra’s Diplomat Pack. Get a legendary weapon additional gold pieces, as well as crafting materials to help you in your perilous adventure.

But that’s not all! The package also includes Asharra's d20, an exclusive permanent + 50% EXP Bonus*, and a wallpaper of Asharra in super high resolution, 2560x1440 pixels, and lower!

This Pack Includes


  • Asharra Wallpaper
  • Asharra d20
  • Legendary Staff of the Magi
  • Permanent Bonus: + 50% EXP Bonus
  • 5,000 Gold Pieces
  • Reinforced Legendary Chest: 40x Diamond, 40x Dragon Hide, 40x Adamantine, 40x Weirwood

*Can be toggled on and off in game if desired.

When purchased and downloaded, the wallpaper artwork will appear at \Steam\steamapps\common\TalesfromCandlekeep\Wallpapers.

fullgame.name: Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560, 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan (10.11) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
